fn.p: How to cite this article: Mudombi, S., Fabricius, C., Van Zyl-Bulitta, V. & Patt, A., 2017, ‘The use of and obstacles to social learning in climate change adaptation initiatives in South Africa’, Jàmbá: Journal of Disaster Risk Studies 9(1), a292. https://doi.org/10.4102/jamba.v9i1.292
Some of the comments made by the respondents regarding the various factors are in quotation marks.
